archimate:Folder.name: Data Management Viewpoint
archimate:Folder.documentation:
These views describe the management of data orginating from generating processes e.g. pipeline steps, their interactions with data management functions up to terminal points.
FIles are traced down to their underlying filesystems. Databases are traced through the service interface to the schema within the database. These views are of interest to scientists and those concerned with overt functionality of the system (for example, what a scientist, to a first order, wants to know about data management).
